SetEnvUIConfigItem.PromptText:
Please enter a domain-qualified user name for virtual directory (HTTP and SOAP) identities.
For Windows Server 2003 (IIS6), ensure this user is in the IIS_WPG group.
Please enter the password for the account specified:
Please enter the domain-qualified account used by the BizTalk host instance which will read/write from file-transport ports:
Please select the file that contains configuration information specific to this environment:

Is this the LAST server in the BizTalk Group you are deploying to?
If so, BizTalk assemblies will be deployed to the BizTalk Management Database.
SetEnvUIConfigItem.Caption: This is the LAST server in the BizTalk Group
